metadata.title: USN-3442-1 -- libXfont vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that libXfont incorrectly handled certain patterns in PatternMatch. A local attacker could use this issue to cause libXfont to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2017-13720)  It was discovered that libXfont incorrectly handled certain malformed PCF files. A local attacker could use this issue to cause libXfont to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly obtain sensitive information. (CVE-2017-13722)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3442-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libxfont1 - 1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.3 libxfont-dev - 1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.3 libxfont1-udeb - 1:1.4.7-1ubuntu0.3 No subscription required
